amendment.description: Amendment sought to "sunset" the provisions of the Paperwork Reduction Act five years after the date of enactment of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to repeal, or "sunset" the provisions of the Paperwork Reduction Act after five years after the date of enactment of the bill.

action.text: On agreeing to the Maloney amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 265 (Roll No. 156).
